OTHER INTERESTING EXPERIENCE:
I previously worked as an intern for the Nampa School District's information technology department where I helped with re-imaging devices, adding/updating/renaming devices in Active Directory, installation of ViewSonics/ projectors/ Unite systems, and helped with some cable management/ installation. Additionally, I worked with the project management team for reformatting district policies, onboarding new employees, and overseeing student internships.
